date.description: Please enter or select a date (YYYY-MM-DD)
date.title: ServicePeriodStart

date_1.description: Please enter or select a date (YYYY-MM-DD)
date_1.title: ServiceEndDate

parameters.$apply: filter(SITE eq '@{triggerBody()?['text_1']}' and year(DATE) eq @{formatDateTime(triggerBody()?['date'], 'yyyy')}and month(DATE) eq @{formatDateTime(triggerBody()?['date'], 'MM')}and DEPOSIT_FLAG ne 'V' and REVENUE_CATEGORY ne 'Per Man Hour')/aggregate(NETEXTERNALREVENUE with sum as TotalNetExternalRevenue)

parameters.$filter: bs_site eq '@{triggerBody()?['text_1']}' and bs_month eq '@{formatDateTime(triggerBody()?['date'],'MM')}' and bs_year eq '@{formatDateTime(triggerBody()?['date'],'yyyy')}'
